EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
he following user roles are available:

User Accounts:

You can create new user accounts or manage existing ones. Please select an option:

User Account Creation:

If you select option 1, I will guide you through the process of creating a new user account. Please provide the following information:

User Account Management:

If you select option 2, I will guide you through the process of managing an existing user account. Please provide the username of the account you want to manage.
